code: import React from"react";import _ from"lodash";import"./AvailableProducts.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AvailableProductsTable=function AvailableProductsTable(props){var searchTerm=props.searchTerm,products=props.products,url=props.url;var capitalized=products.map(function(element){return{name:_.capitalize(element.name),photo_url:element.photo_url,category_url:element.category_url,price:element.price};});var filtered=_.uniqBy(capitalized,function(element){return element.name;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"contentTable",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Price"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:filtered.filter(function(value){if(value===""){return value;}else if(value.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())){return value;}}).map(function(product,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"image",src:url+product.photo_url,alt:"Not Available"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("th",{children:[product.name," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("th",{children:[product.price.toFixed(2)+" €"," "]})]},index);})})]});};export default AvailableProductsTable;
